description:
The Men’s Intraknit Thermal Merino Base Layer 3/4 Bottom are the pants you need to stay warm and perform well all winter. They are made of Merino Sport yarn, which combines the benefits of ZQ-certified Merino wool with the strength and quick drying of polyester. They have a seamless knit mesh ventilation that helps you stay dry and comfortable, and a 3D-mapped design that gives you maximum mobility and durability. These are the men’s wool bottoms that every adventurer should have in their closet.

  • Intraknit™ technology, which integrates insulation, articulation, and ventilation enhances your movement and comfort during high-intensity activities
  • Merino Sport yarn combines the power of Merino with the durability and fast dry times of polyester
  • Seamlessly knit mesh ventilation designed to help keep you dry and comfortable
  • 3D mapping results in near custom fit and freedom of movement
  • They have a slim fit that follows the shape of your body
name: Smartwool Intraknit Thermal Merino Base Layer 3/4 Bottom - Men's
